Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 Guo and co-workers used a number of fused thiophene spacers to tune the aggregation behavior of difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX)-based donor polymers among which PffBX-TT with thieno[3,2-b]thiophene as a spacer showed intermediate temperature - dependent aggregation strength allowing the control of blend film morphology during PSC fabrication.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| fused thiophene spacers |
| difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX) |
| PffBX-TT |
| thieno[3,2-b]thiophene |

| --- |
| fused thiophene spacers |
| PffBX-TT |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "difluorobenzoxadiazole (ffBX)" - This is a chemical compound and not a material name.
* "thieno[3,2-b]thiophene" - This is a chemical compound and not a material name.
